bioconda.name: bcbio-nextgen
bioconda.summary: Validated, scalable, community developed variant calling, RNA-seq and small RNA analysis

biocontainers.name: bcbio-nextgen
biocontainers.summary: Python scripts and modules for automated next gen sequencing analysis. these provide a fully automated pipeline for taking sequencing results from an illumina sequencer, converting them to standard fastq format, aligning to a reference genome, doing snp calling, and producing a summary pdf of results.

biotools.summary: Python scripts and modules for automated next gen sequencing analysis. These provide a fully automated pipeline for taking sequencing results from an Illumina sequencer, converting them to standard Fastq format, aligning to a reference genome, doing SNP calling, and producing a summary PDF of results.

bioschemas.name: Bcbio-nextgen
bioschemas.summary: Python scripts and modules for automated next gen sequencing analysis. These provide a fully automated pipeline for taking sequencing results from an Illumina sequencer, converting them to standard Fastq format, aligning to a reference genome, doing SNP calling, and producing a summary PDF of results.
